summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Tuwaiq Humanitarian Services Association website. Backend APIs working with 83.3% success rate, frontend fully functional with excellent Arabic RTL design. All core features including services, bank transfer, and authentication are working properly.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 400 instead of expected 401 for invalid credentials
Returns 200 instead of expected 201 for successful submission
minor_bugs.impact: Minimal - bank transfer submission works correctly

passed_tests: Home page loads with hero banners and services section
Services page displays all four services (سقيا الماء، إطعام الجائع، إفطار صائم، الحالات الخاصة)
Bank Transfer page shows both bank accounts with correct IBANs
Login page has functional authentication form
Navigation and Arabic RTL layout working perfectly
Bank accounts API returns Rajhi and Arab National Bank details
